summary: This document is an email chain from June 2020 regarding the processing of payments for therapy services for confirmed victims of Jeffrey Epstein. It involves coordination between an FBI Victim Services Division Program Manager and other parties, and mentions a victim represented by attorney Gloria Allred.

persons.name: Gloria Allred
persons.context: Mentioned as the attorney representing one of the Epstein victims discussed in the email chain; all communication for that victim must go through her office.

keyFacts: The email chain discusses facilitating payment for therapy services for confirmed victims of Jeffrey Epstein.
At least one victim is confirmed and is represented by attorney Gloria Allred, requiring all communication to go through her office.
The correspondence involves an FBI Victim Services Division Program Manager coordinating victim assistance.
The document references a potential additional incident for one victim that, if confirmed, would require filing an OVS (Office for Victims of Crime) form.
